description: Progressive 400s: 1st set: 4 x 400m at half-marathon pace (60-second recovery); 2nd set: 4 x 400m at 10k pace (90-second recovery); 3rd set: 4 x 400m at 5k pace (120-second recovery). 1-lap recovery between sets.
Gear shifters: 3 sets x 1200m (400m at marathon pace, 400m at half-marathon pace, 400m at 10k pace). Continuous running for 1200m/3 laps. 1-lap recovery jog between sets.
Social Run: 'somewhat perfect' 4-mile loop course around downtown Erie. Open to runners of all abilities.
